website_summaries.verdict: This cream is a splurge, but for good reason. A surge of vitamin C helps brighten dark spots and prevents future damage.
pros: Intensely nourishing with a combination of sunflower seed and rice bran extracts
Many customers notice firmer skin after a few weeks
cons: Too heavy duty for oily skin types

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I laughed when I read visible results from Day 1 but it was true. I’m 70 years old and you have to see my picture. I hope you can see the difference in just one application. I am thrilled. Can’t wait to see how my skin looks after a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This really works! I have loose skin due to losing ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I have loose skin due to losing weight really fast and the Drs said only surgery would work. Nope I've been using this for the past 6 months and I see results.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuff, SAME DAY JUST LIKE IT SAYS😊
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how crepey skin changes same day!!! I've been using Beverly Hills Dr cream but the$$$ is killing me. Reasonably priced and it says you'll see a difference SAME DAY and IT DOES😨 ☺️!!! I kid you not!! And thin, crepey skin changes on application!!! But it also looks good the next day 🤤☺️. Ordering more before the price goes up. Unbelievable skin,body cream.
customer_reviews.author: JUST-ME

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful collagen!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I order this lotion, I use it on my face and neck and it is very good, not greasy at all. I have noticed that my skin is tighter, the pores from my nose are completely closed! My skin was softer before but now feels even better, I'll keep ordering it!
customer_reviews.author: Dayce C.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this lotion due to dry itchy skin that just started a month ago. I am very pleased with the results after using for a few weeks now. There is no scent to it which I like and it has relieved the itchy dry skin. I would buy this lotion again.
customer_reviews.author: taylorsue

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: At 76, and a recent weight loss, I was a little wrinkled and dried out. I have allergies, so.... No smell and no allergic reaction, and after a week of coating my body after showering, all of my rough spots disappeared and my wrinkles are starting to smooth. The cream feels great, and best of all WORKS! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O'shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Winter is harsh on my hands working outside. I use this and cover with gloves at night and my skin has stopped splitting open. I use it after a shower all over and like that is not super scented, goes on easily. The only issue was the pumps not working but manufacturer replaced them. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: boo153

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product with very quick results
customer_reviews.text: Today is the second day I used this lotion. I noticed a difference with the first application. Today is even better. My skin is softer and more supple. I am almost 60 years old and my skin is getting thinner and dryer. I simply can not believe the difference this product has made in TWO DAYS. This lotion absorbs quickly and it not greasy. I plan to use it from head to toe! I eagerly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and true to its word- results in one use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and true to its word- results in one use! I have never had a collagen product that worked immediately without being super pricey. I use it a few times a day. has taken away deeper lines between my brows that were caused by stress and lack of sleep. Wow!! Downfall is that it has mineral listed as a top ingredient..
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer but plugs pores
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer but plugs pores. Use for hands, arms, feet... anywhere in between, but if you ever had skin problems on your face, please do not use it on it. otherwise I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaKat

customer_reviews.title: Great Value -- Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very first thing I put on my skin after cleansing. And...I am using it on my arms and neck, too. It is a collagen builder, and does a great job of protecting my skin. Love it. The pump on top makes it easy to use. My husband has begun using it, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review until I had been using this product for over 2 months. I have to say that I am beyond impressed by it. I have large crows feet in the corners of both of my eyes that are now virtually gone. I have also noticed a tightening in my chin area and forehead. This product does “tingle” and sometimes burns when you put it on but that must be why it’s working!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great with a bonus!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby purchaser this to help strengthen the thin easily puncherd skin on his aging arms. He began using it on both his arms and his face. He no longer has near the trouble workin' with large equipment on the farm and the wrinkles on his face are smoothing out. We are pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Farm Chick

customer_reviews.title: WOW GREAT PRODUCT FOR A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I am so delighted with this cream. The moisture it provides is very, very rich. I did see a difference the first day I used it. I'm on day 3, and I am very pleased with the results. I've stopped using my other moisturizing creams, and only use this moisturizer. I'm will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Diomaris Contreras

customer_reviews.title: This stuff actually works! I was skeptical but I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works! I was skeptical but I’ve gotten major results in only a few weeks. My skin is soooo much tighter!
customer_reviews.author: KimSam

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in Love! I'm 73 and have always been in the sun, I decided to try the collagen (I love the Retinol also). I noticed immediate results on my face and neck, so I used it on my arms and legs, those results are even better! Thank you, please don't raise the price, I'll be back for more very soon 😎
customer_reviews.author: Leeners

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Moisturizing, but Buy for the Collagen
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I don’t like about this lotion is that it takes a long time to absorb into my skin. I can’t say it’s the best moisturizer, but I bought it for the collagen benefit. I don’t notice any more firmness in my skin than before I bought this product, but I haven’t been using it long enough to know for sure. I DID like it enough to purchase the company’s Hyaluronic acid lotions, which has high reviews on Amazon. The prices are very reasonable. The lotion is unscented, which I like because then I can add my essential oils to the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Banishing Abdominal Wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of years. I am soon to be 82 years old. I recently had a 30 pound weight loss in two weeks due to illness and have a very wrinkled abdomen and am using the collagen in that area and feel it is helping.
customer_reviews.author: Helen V. Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This was such a waste of money. I gave it at least a month before determining that it has done nothing for me. And then I ended up finding these for only $5 while looking for something at Walmart and was very livid that I paid double that price when these were ON SALE on here. So ridiculously disappointed in this product. I bought the two pack because it had good reviews that it works. Well it doesn't. It's not a great moisturizer either.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Not only has it tightened my skin but it has also minimized my appearance of cellulite. Very moisturizing as well. The other thing I love about this lotion is that it absorbs into your skin with no gressey or heavy residue. The last thing I want to say is it doesn't take much time to notice an improvement in your skin. I was seeing results in days.
customer_reviews.author: R. Teders

customer_reviews.title: Great for really dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Really good for extremely dry skin. I suffer from extremely dry skin and this lotion is thick creamy and really lasts a long time. It really helps itching too. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: probably great for anynoe with less sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: it irritates my skin BADLY, really upsetting collagen products are usually never hard on my sensitive skin. :( im still on the hunt after this product let me down. probably great for anynoe with less sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Rachel blakesley

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Faulty Pump!
customer_reviews.text: The jury’s out on how well the cream works at my crepe-like skin areas. It seems to hydrate well, from what I can see. The problem I have is with the pump. It was broken. The thing snapped and does not work at all. As a matter of fact, I had to tape it down to keep the jar sealed. If I want to use the cream, I have to unscrew the entire lid and deal with it making a wasteful mess. NOTHING is more annoying to me when using a pumped product than having than having it in a non-functioning container. I actually got two of these. I really hope the other one isn’t broken. I’m not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Emanuelson

customer_reviews.title: Fine lotion
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it's really improving my collagen. My Derm explained why it probably doesn't really increase collagen production, but as a cream for my hands and body it's great. Nice and thick, not really much of a scent. I like to use it on my elbows, keeps them from getting funky.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Walmart sells it for half the price but the truth is I don't like Walmart, I don't like how they treat their ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this so far. Walmart sells it for half the price but the truth is I don't like Walmart, I don't like how they treat their employees, how they affect small towns, and I just hate going in there its so big!!! Anyhow got my package quickly via prime and I love it. I think it does help my skin, I feel a warm sensation after applying it, the sensation is very mild and doesn't last long, I hope this means its working and also tightening my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Randoll Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Great product, one of my go-to's for excessively dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Great cream, absorbs quickly, doesn't leave an unpleasant residue. Works wonders on my hands. I'm a trucker, and my hands take a beating in the winter from cold, wet work gloves, and cold temperatures. I've tried dozens of moisturizers, and this one is far and away the best product I've found for me. Moreover, this particular brand of collagen cream is no longer widely available from a certain big box retailer Stateside, and is not available from any brick and mortars in Canada, to our knowledge. I was very happy to buy from this seller, and will definitely not hesitate to re-order in the future.
customer_reviews.author: red_hemi_rt_2008

customer_reviews.title: Wowzers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and did not believe I would see a difference, but in a week my stretch marks were fading and markedly less visible! Buy it and see for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Red diva 41

customer_reviews.title: Very Unique product
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional collagen product for the price. I love to use it at night about an hour before bed by applying a thick layer. It has a very cooling effect on the skin and feels wonderful. By the time I am ready for bed it has mostly absorbed and the next morning my skin is soft and smooth. Very happy I found this.
customer_reviews.author: pippin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely No Results!
customer_reviews.text: This is just another cream created to fool the public into thinking because it contains collagen that it will be beneficial in helping older skin. I've used it daily since receiving the item and have seen no changes whatsoever. An expensive lesson to learn.
customer_reviews.author: gwen magyar

customer_reviews.title: 100% Dissatisfaction Guaranteed.
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer does not stand behind the 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed as advertised in the listing. Sent numerous emails to the seller asking to resolve my skin rash after using the lotion, the seller would not reply the email back to me. Horrible product, basically smell like chemical like others stated.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every morning and every night and sometimes in the middle of the day. It feels great and has no smell (I find that great). I use it on my hands and face. It soaks in fast and makes my skin incredibly soft and hydrated. I will be purchasing more in the future. The size is amazing and it doesn't run out fast. The pump is great because one pump of it is the perfect amount for hand and face. It doesn't make my hands or face sticky, or oily either.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon livingstone- irwin

customer_reviews.title: It is a good moisturizer; not greasy and I believe it has ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and being over 65 I was looking for something that would help with the under arm sag. It is a good moisturizer; not greasy and I believe it has helped some with that sagging from weight less and no exercise to firm up.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L McDuff

customer_reviews.title: and my skin looks and feels great. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I always had issues finding a product that works, and let me tell ya. This product works, and my skin looks and feels great.LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing I don't like about it
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I don't like about it. I have incredibly dry skin. No other body cream I bought and used did what this Collagen skin rescue is doing. My skin looks and feels marvelous. I will continue to purchase the product. I recommend it to anyone who wants soft skin. Even my face is benefiting from this cream.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Irelan

customer_reviews.title: Love both product very much and should keep buying it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to put it all over in the morning and Aragan Oil Cream, I use in the evening. Love both product very much and should keep buying it should the price remain stable.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne J Walsh

customer_reviews.title: It's not a miracle cream
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really have high hopes for change in skin appearance based on the price and ingredients. The cream does absorb nicely, but I have not seen any results. I prefer to use something 100% natural for keeping my skin moist during the dry winter.
customer_reviews.author: PMP

customer_reviews.title: Nice low cost lotion
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at $11 and loved it. A very light and effective lotion at a great price. I have watched the price jump around a little. There are pricier brands that I like better and will purchase those when this is sold at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Khanfam05

customer_reviews.title: Works really well. Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I'm always skeptical about hand creams, but I figured this was worth a shot. I’m trying to improve the “crepe” look of my very dry skin. Collagen products seem so expensive. This one was much more reasonably priced, so I tried it. I really like it. It makes my skin feel really good, and the effect lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys D Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I am sensitive to a lot of products, but this has no strong smell just a nice clean smell. It feels great(not too greasy and absorbs pretty fast). I have only been using it a few days but already notice a difference. Highly recommend and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product with some trepidation but found that I like it better than any I have tried. It is a great moisturizer and doesn't irritate my skin. Although there will never be a product that tightens skin to remove wrinkles 100%, this one did help make my skin appear more smooth. The only thing I struggle with is when the lotion gets down to a certain level in the container, the pump no longer picks it up. I have to unscrew the lid in order to use the remaining product. Otherwise....I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: No Fragrance, as far as I can tell/smell lol. Very moisturizing firming and it works on the overall appearance, my skin is glowing and a little firmer nice size jar and I love this pump!. I will buy more of this. If my review has helped please click the helpful tab below, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: I don't like returning items but please fix this issue
customer_reviews.text: Received this today worth broken seal and broken pump, opened... I don't like returning items but please fix this issue. Please response...
customer_reviews.author: Angie Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizer at good price
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product. It feels a little greasy when first applied, but is absorbed after a while, so you are able to put foundation over if desired. I cannot see a difference as far as plumping or wrinkle reduction, but at age 76, I wasn't expecting a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd jar of Advanced Clinical face cream. Love it so far. Love the pump jar too. My face is responding favorably and I'm not spending too much!
customer_reviews.author: Montana gal.

customer_reviews.title: Burns when I applied to my face.
customer_reviews.text: Burned my skin and had several small zits on my face the day after using it. It also has mineral oil in it. I would think this would be ok for a hand cream, but not good for the face unless your skin is like leather and can deal with the burning.
customer_reviews.author: Sala

customer_reviews.title: Tight skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product after having a baby I have loose skin on my stomach and this lotion firms it up. I apply it every night.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is revolutionary!! With one application this tightened and brightened my skin. Excellent product! It is not as moisturizing though... if you have very dry skin this may not be the best moisturizer for you. I must say I wonder... how such powerful products are priced so low. Scary... hehe!
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I use collagen in my anti wrinkle cream I make.the store brands don't tighten my face enough.with the collagen and other ingredients it makes my fine lines around eyes, mouth and forehead invisible.i love this size container.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Becker

customer_reviews.title: I saw results almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I have more than one issue, for instance dark bags under my eyes. This is doing wonders. I'm generally skeptical, so this was a good price comparatively and I gave it a shot. In this case, the technology really does what it says it does. As to "sheerness", yes, it's not detectable more than regular moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Remarkable Results!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the product arrive in record time, but works just as promised. I immediately opened the package and applied to the wrinkles around my eyes. I went back to the mirror 20 minutes later and was SHOCKED-what a difference!!! And so fast! Thank you for making such a great product affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Left my skin dry
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that this cream would help my dry skin after reading the reviews but unfortunately it did not. After using for approximately 2 weeks my skin felt dry even in places not previously dry. The pump also did not function. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: This tub of lotion is great. I've used it for a month and really ...
customer_reviews.text: This tub of lotion is great. I've used it for a month and really love it. My skin has benefited greatly from it. I use it on my face and my body. Pretty versatile. I do dry brushing then hop into the shower and slather this on after. My skin is much firmer and smoother. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: shery43

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the container. Husband really likes this lotion, and so do I. Nice texture for the whole body. Very light fragrance. Absorbs quickly. Not greasy, but with a longer lasting feel than most ordinary lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Burton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed the texture of my skin from dry and rough to silky and smooth. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty P

customer_reviews.title: Very good and very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very good and very moisturizing. The price can not be beat. Collagen is expensive. You get so much product. This is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbey

customer_reviews.title: Clinical collegen review
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product very much. Its worth the money and it's packaged nicely. My dry skin appreciates how it makes my face feel. I might not look like a movie star but I feel 10 years younger.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it seems to be working!
customer_reviews.text: First time and my crepe skin (neck) look so healthy and soft! I truly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I don't love it, but it's okay. There is ZERO smell, so if that's what you're going for you've found it. I like that it's not greasy, but I don't think it's doing anything amazing for my skin. I'll use it, but I don't know if I'll order it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sulkowski

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Because of illness my skin on arms and legs have become very try and flaky. This product doesn’t have any fragrance so no more sneezing when I apply it. Just soft moisturizing lotion .
customer_reviews.author: Lennie schrantz

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! It definitely moisturizes and helps the appearance of skin. This is my second container; the first I purchased at Sam's Club a while back. The only drawback for me is that it contains mineral oil.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product as I age I see that I have a few more sagging loose Parts perhaps and it really helps on the legs in the arms especially I love this product
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many of the Advanced Clinical products and am impressed. Value and quality. Does exactly as described. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: I'm An Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product...because I have very dry skin and my dermatologist wanted me to use something after a shower. I've been using this for a few weeks and can see the change in my forearms...unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar C. Morley

customer_reviews.title: This product was amazing i saw results in about 3-5 days
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use the product a while before giving rating. I have a number 11 wrinkle line between eyebrows i bought a real expensive wrinkle line product did not work.. This product was amazing i saw results in about 3-5 days. I will be buying this product again. this product also adds the elasticity back Not to mention the radiance it adds Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good!
customer_reviews.text: it has huge amount of content. I have been using this for about 2 months, months,but I didn't finished this. (And, good moisture)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to desert drying
customer_reviews.text: The first jar I got came in a box with no packaging, so needless to say, the pump was broken off and there was cream all over the inside of the box. I ordered a second and I love it. I've only used it a few days, but so far, I feel my skin is softer and more hydrated. I live in the desert, so this kind of product is very important to us.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I just received the cream, and have tried it for 1 day, it's very smooth and its easy to to rubb in, I'm going to use it on my face and my arms as both start loosing it's firmness
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Kristensson

customer_reviews.title: Boroken jar
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion but on my last order, the container was broken and lotion was all over the inside of shipping box i couldnt get a replacement, only a refund.
customer_reviews.author: KansasTeacher

customer_reviews.title: on my third jar
customer_reviews.text: love this lotion! I use it all over my body but particularly on my arms. I've noticed that they don't look as "crapey" as they did before I started using this lotion. Will Keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! If you have skin that is dry or itchy and can't make a difference with other products, this one will make a big difference for you! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be shipped with care
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and upon unboxing I find the pump is broken. It doesn't seem to hinder usage but we shall see. I will update after a couple of weeks use.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Softer skin
customer_reviews.text: I do like it very much, makes my skin feel very soft
customer_reviews.author: Awo Amankwah

customer_reviews.title: love this produce!
customer_reviews.text: I know it said you would see a difference in the first use. That was a very true statement. I had creap skin now it's barely noticeable. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ann

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!! It works fast
customer_reviews.text: Works from day one, it’s true!!!! Definitely noticed a difference on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not an instant fix!
customer_reviews.text: It took a full 30 days of use to see a difference, but I like it and will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion & container.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion & container. Purchased because I was looking for special skin treatment & this container easy to use one-handed. Nice economy size, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a huge changel in the skin on my hands. Wrinkles are far less, hands seem to havet smoothed out and are soften then before using. It also has helped the rough skin on my feet. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Good product. The skin absorvers it really well
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The skin absorvers it really well. Not grease, soft smell (not too much perfume). It does not interfere with my cologne. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Q.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight thin moisturizing lotion however it does moisturize well. I've only used it a few times but i really like it so far
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Not Greasy , absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product . I like the consistency and it isn't greasy . I've only been using it for a week so I don't know what improvements there yet are if any.
customer_reviews.author: P.Bryan

customer_reviews.title: this was by far the best.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my hands. They were extremely dry and cracked. I put this on at night and saw improvement after one day! I had tried several other lotions Eucerin, Aveeno, this was by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: MRS.M

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a low price point
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was skeptical. There are so many brands out there that claim they tighten skin but this actually does a great job. My hands and knees look tighter and my skin seems to have a better texture.
customer_reviews.author: Athea Gales

customer_reviews.title: Love it ♥
customer_reviews.text: I just love this, it does not have any smell at all, but your skin absorbs all of it and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: la del viaje

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is at least as good as “ Crepe Erase” (which is way overpriced). I live in an arid climate and this works well as a body moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: however I like the non-greasy feel with no overpowering scent
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it 3 days ago so it might be premature to render a judgment, however I like the non-greasy feel with no overpowering scent. I use it on my hands and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice lotion, absorbs quickly and doesn't smell like anything! It seems to reduce the appearance of crepey skin on elbows, knees, and chest area.
customer_reviews.author: L PELLETIER

customer_reviews.title: My skin has been very dry and nothing has worked ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been very dry and nothing has worked I have been using this for less than a week and it seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.author: norma wallace

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product. I will order it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I will order it again. It leaves my skin so soft and supple. When I apply it before bedtime, it is still soft and moist the next morning, so it retains the moistness all night.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Safly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. I use this after I shower, all over. I have incredibly dry skin. This is nice, thick, easily absorbed lotion and keeps my skin very soft. I can use it on my face and I don’t break out. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Blu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My Goddaughter gave me this product from her job. I am so happy I was able to find it online. It really has reduced my laugh lines as well as the lines on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t buy it for myself I gifted to my Aunt and she said it’s work and she noticed the different in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Beden

customer_reviews.title: The best lotion I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is probly the best cream I ever had I've never felt so soft the only problem is the packaging. I purchase it twice And Both times the pump does not work. I have so many compliments about how soft my skin feels .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is wonderful. Feels wonderful putting it on and absorbs nicely. I wear it nightly and my face feels moist in the morning. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LHM

customer_reviews.title: Break out with little tiny pimples
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this lotion for 3 times , 2 nights and 1 day time . Start finding little white pimples all over my face ... never had this kind problems with any face cream before..... very disappointed . Never buy cheap face cream again !
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Great for crepey skin!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product for a great price. I began using a couple days ago, slathering on my arms and legs especially, after showering. I see a difference already in my "old lady skin" - not looking as crepey, big improvement. Also nice for my 63 year-old hands. Started putting on my neck, too - I'd like to say I think it's helping in that area, too. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: FunnyGirlTerri

customer_reviews.title: This is good lotion but I'm not really seeing a big difference ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good lotion but I'm not really seeing a big difference in my skin yet. But it is still good lotion and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Cory&Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Magic potion cream
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what they put in this but it’s magical. I went to get my usual Brazillian wax and the lady even said my skin look younger. Only after a week using it !
customer_reviews.author: Ms Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Does Very Little
customer_reviews.text: Does very little good on my wrinkles. I have tries several and this is as good or better than most of them
customer_reviews.author: Mamie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Skin Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and there is no scent. I use it every day after a shower or bath and already re-ordered another 2 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure softness
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way it make your skin feel so soft and smooth. I’m trying for the firm effect now I use it everyday so I will let you know if it works for the firm and tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lacewell

product_meta.title: Advanced Clinicals Collagen Skin Rescue Lotion - Hydrate, Moisturize, Lift, Firm. Great for Dry Skin (16oz)
feature_bullets: ADVANCED CLINICALS COLLAGEN CREAM - Helps eliminate the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines and sagging skin. Great to use under your eyes, neck, decollete, and hands.

POWERFUL ANTI-AGING FORMULA - Delicate formula can be used on face to help fight the signs of aging. Anti-aging cream also can be used as an everyday body moisturizer. Great for people with dry or sensitive skin. Massage into skin for supreme exfoliation.
FOR SALON PROFESSIONALS - HUGE 16oz JAR WITH EASY TO USE PUMP that will last you months.

SAFE ALTERNATIVE TO SURGERY OR COLLAGEN INJECTIONS - Tighten problem areas, hydrate, moisturize and firm the skin around your eyes. Soothing lotion is great for post-treatment, after surgeries and to help reduce the appearance of scars.
TRUSTED FORMULA - Contains Green Tea, Aloe Vera and Chamomile. Paraben-free. Manufactured in the USA. Not tested on animals. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
